author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Philipsburg-Osceola Middle School celebrates Pi Day
text: CLEARFIELD COUNTY, Pa. (WTAJ) – Philipsburg-Osceola Middle School students celebrated Pi Day with fun activities and lessons. Pi Day is an annual celebration of the mathematical constant known as Pi (3.14...) and is observed on March 14 (3/14) since three, one and four are the first three figures. Philipsburg-Osceola Middle School Celebrates Pi Day on an annual basis.
